sentences.sContent: Nevertheless, in some cases, the demand for a product or process is all too evident.
sentences.sCn: 不过，在有些情况下，对某种产品或工艺的需求是极其明显的。

sentences.sContent: The growing popularity of the subject is evident in the numbers of students wanting to study it.
sentences.sCn: 这门课程越来越受欢迎，从想修读此课程的学生人数上即可明显看出这一点。

phrases.pCn: 不言而喻的；不证自明的

remMethod.val: e ＋ vid(看见) ＋ ent(…的) → 容易看得见的 → 明显的， 明白的

trans.tranOther: easy to see, notice, or understand
